40.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
40.text: Good evening, Master! Oh, I am inundated with relief, having finally found your vile self.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler looms over the Tav's bedrool. TAV does not notice him, but they are trying hard to sleep.

55.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
55.text: Although, after I found the bard's body, I was waylaid. Awestruck, I sat, admiring the work night and day.

57.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
57.text: But I saved the gall bladder as a memento of your talent. It's tucked safely inside my breast pocket.

2.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
2.text: Hope you don't mind - I know you always told me not to stand too close to art when it's on display.

78.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
78.text: Oh, where are my manners - you've forgotten me, haven't you? Sceleritas Fel. Your undyingly loyal Butler.

47.text: What do you mean you're my Butler?!

76.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
76.text: I also tend to your grounds, manage your estate, arrange murder victims for you to systematically brutalise, and serve dinner.

24.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
24.text: Although I must apologise: dinner is nowhere near ready tonight. For we are far behind on our murder schedule.

48.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
48.text: Good evening, Master! I'm ever-relieved to have found you at last, for you've been shirking your duties!
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler looms over the Tav's bedrool. TAV does not notice him, but they are trying hard to sleep.

65.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
65.text: A fine fellow of your gruelling station must continue to show the innocent masses what-for.

37.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
37.text: I arranged a perfect crime for you: the sweet little girl Alfira was to place herself in your knife's way.

71.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
71.text: But ooh, poor itching one, your little indisposition has made you absent-minded indeed if you didn't notice.

54.speaker: Narrator
54.text: *Your thoughts are back on the twisted Sceleritas and his honeyed words of violence.*
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Butler looms over the Tav's bedrool. TAV does not notice him, but they are trying hard to sleep.

15.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: TAV notices that the Butler has been above them while they were thinking this.

60.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
60.text: Hells! Can you read my thoughts?
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: The avatar awakens and stands up.

23.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
23.text: I don't need to. They are all the same.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: The avatar awakens and stands up.

50.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
50.text: There is but one thing on your mind. And it won't go away, until your thirsty Urge is sated.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The avatar awakens and stands up.

34.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
34.text: I come here, for I wish to bring you another powerful tithe.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: The avatar awakens and stands up.

5.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
5.text: I come here, for I wish to bring you a powerful tithe.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a clawNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a claw

4.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
4.text: But I cannot grant you this prize quite yet. You must do something divinely unspeakable first.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a clawNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a claw

51.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a clawNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a claw

25.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a clawNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a claw

22.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
22.text: The reward will titillate your twitching Urge, in preparation for the rest of your inheritance to come.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a clawNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a claw

45.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
45.text: You will receive a royal prize for killing this pretty girl.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a clawNodeContext: BUTLER conjurs a spectral vision of Isobel with a wave of a claw

11.text: Isobel: the cleric with the sweetest face of the Moon.

0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
0.text: Isobel: the cleric with the sweetest face of the Moon.

43.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
43.text: She is too precious to live.

19.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
19.text: I won't let myself touch another innocent.

77.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
77.text: I felt the desire to kill her so strongly when we met...

18.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
18.text: What has she done to deserve such a fate?

33.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
33.text: Why, the greatest crime of them all: nothing at all!

56.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
56.text: Fear not. Her death will fill an entire village with piles of bodies.

70.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
70.text: I might be willing. Is there a catch?

7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
7.text: No catch at all. You will get to see the beautiful sight of an entire village filled with bodies.

44.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
44.text: You adore piles of bodies, Master. They have always been your favourite.

21.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
21.text: Give in to the rush of joy that courses through you.

36.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
36.text: Oh Master, consider the tiny mishap with the bard you had the last time we met.

61.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
61.text: Your unconscious, clever mind hungers for extreme violence.

66.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
66.text: Who knows who you might kill next if you do not satisfy your Urge?

38.text: Stop talking as if you're brewing me a cup of tea! We're talking about real people!

8.text: I'm not going to kill Isobel! Last Light is doomed without her.

53.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
53.text: Perhaps you have failed to consider all the piles of bodies that will fill the village?

13.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
13.text: One with the sweetest face of the moon.

6.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
6.text: The killing is good enough fun even without a reward!

32.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
32.text: Oh, you are such an eloquent and well-mannered Master.

26.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
26.text: I'm sure you will breeze through these trivial little exams with great distinction.

73.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
73.text: I kill for myself, not because you command me.

59.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
59.text: You are such a pleasure to serve! Of course, you are killing for yourself.

74.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
74.text: From coast to coast, our realm only exists for you to play with, after all.

9.text: I'm not doing a thing you say! This isn't who I am.

64.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
64.text: You have been a prodigal young Master.

67.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
67.text: But you have not been disinherited yet. You can rule with such ease, if you follow your call.

3.text: Haven't I done enough killing already?

42.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
42.text: I was just lying here wishing you wouldn't come back.

69.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
69.text: Oh! My nauseating Master! Such rudeness is unbecoming of your august station.

62.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
62.text: It has been too long since you venerated me. You're slipping.

68.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
68.text: Those words sting, though they are true. I vow I will say your name a thousand times in prayer before I rest tonight.

12.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
12.text: I love you so dearly, Master.

63.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
63.text: Ssh. Ssh. Quiet, dear depraved one. We wouldn't want to wake the others. They would be so jealous.
